info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of customer documents and images.
info.title: Customer documents and images

get.description: Retrieves the document image details which includes document type,path where it is stored,date on which it is received and last updated.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: imageApplication
parameters.description: Indicates the domain name (technical identifier) the image/document is attached to. E.g., Customer, Payments, Loans, Deposits, etc..,

parameters.name: imageType
parameters.description: Indicates the internal classification of images - such as Photographs, Documents, Passports, etc..,

parameters.description: Contains the identifier associated to the image reference

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

mediaType.description: Indicates the social media type, as defined by the institution e.g. - FACEBOOK - LINKEDIN - MOBILE - TWITTER

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

referenceNumber.description: Specifies the reference for the document, if any.

status.description: Contains status of the data rights request.Allowed values are INITIATED, INPROGESS, EXTENDED, COMPLETED, REJECTED.

statusDate.description: The date status was last updated

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

documentNature.description: Specifies the nature of the document, which can possibly take values like DUPLICATE,ORIGINAL etc

statusDate.description: The date status was last updated

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

documentNature.description: Specifies the nature of the document, which can possibly take values like DUPLICATE,ORIGINAL etc
